service.name: Replacement Cheque
service.description: This service enables taxpayers to request a replacement cheque.

Dimension.name: Account Maintenance
Dimension.desc: Account management covers all activities that result in outward payments being issued, adjustments or updates to accounts. These services enable individual, non-individual entities and their representatives to request a financial transaction relating to their account, such as a transfer of credit between accounts, a replacement cheque, or a search for a missing payment.

Dimension.name: Payment & Accounting
Dimension.desc: The Payment cluster covers all services that facilitate the community to either make or receive payments to accurately settle their tax and superannuation obligations. This cluster also contains services to perform account maintenance such as credit transfers or remission of a penalty which when actioned, will adjust the customer's account to ensure it is reflecting an accurate balance to allow for either making or receiving payment. In this cluster compliance services help the community to comply through services such as payment arrangements.
